longBusinessSummary: Investcorp India Acquisition Corp does not have significant operations. It intends to effect a merger, capital stock exchange, asset acquisition, stock purchase, reorganization, or other similar business combination with one or more businesses. The company was formerly known as Investcorp Acquisition Corp. and changed its name to Investcorp India Acquisition Corp in January 2022. Investcorp India Acquisition Corp was incorporated in 2021 and is based in George Town, the Cayman Islands.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Harsh  Shethia
